name: sap
description: This is the Github Page for SAP Group 10 SP-SOC Teaching System Enhancements

scripts.setup: npm install && cd .\frontend\ && npm install && cd .. && cd .\backend\ && npm install && exit 1
scripts.launch: cd .\frontend\ && pm2 start index.js --name tas_frontend --watch --time  && cd .. && cd .\backend\ && pm2 start app.js --name tas_backend --watch --time && exit 1
